name: Yhosa
appearance: Lacquer-stained hands, coral pendants at the throat, two missing fingers replaced with articulated bone-splints, eyes quick as gulls.
character: Idealist with an engineer’s patience; every cut must carry the city safely a century hence.
talents: whistles harmonics to test stress in bone
intuits workable coral composites from a touch
flaws: risks experimental methods on live structures
dreams: Master coral-lacquered bone that outlasts storms
Win parity with the Rime-Lantern Guild in council
Keep Orum’s frame intact for generations
secrets: Authorized an unpermitted cut beneath the Dorsal Span to test a brace
Buys off-ledger Tideglass salts via shadow-brokers
Forged a temporary Brinelaw seal to move materials during a moratorium
